name: Operators Leadscore API
description: Quickly score leads with a simple, secure API. This FastAPI microservice accepts contact details and returns a quality score to prioritize outreach.
usage: Clone this repository and install dependencies.
Run the FastAPI app using Uvicorn.
Request an API key via the provided script or admin endpoint.
Call `/score` with your API key and lead data to receive a score.
architecture: Endpoint `/score` accepts lead information (name, company, etc.) and returns a 0–100 score.
API key management controls access via the `x-api-key` header.
Integration ready: easy to plug into CRMs or other systems with JSON responses.
Customizable: swap out the scoring logic for your own model or heuristics.
